tool.name: Fetch RnaChipIntegrator canonical genes
tool.description: Fetch and install canonical gene lists for RnaChipIntegrator

param.name: description
param.label: Description of canonical gene list
param.help: Text that will appear in the list of canonical genes

param.name: reference_source_selector
param.label: Choose the source for the reference genome

param.name: gene_list_filename
param.label: Full path to the canonical genes file on disk

param.name: create_symlink
param.label: Create symlink to orignal data instead of copying

tool.help:
**What it does**
Fetches a canonical gene list file and populates the "rnachipintegrator_canonical_genes" data table.
------
.. class:: infomark
**Notice:** If you leave name, description, or id blank, it will be generated automatically.
